query.queryString: (/article/relations/categories/collection/code='resultsPack,projectsInfoPack,brief' OR (/result/relations/categories/collection/code='deliverable,publication' OR contenttype='project')) AND ('SUSTAINABILITY' OR 'INNOVATION' OR 'MULTI-CRITERIA')

warnings.message: One of the fields on which a sort was requested does not exist

result.title: Final Consultation Process Report
result.description: D2.5 - Final Consultation Process Report is the final version of D2.3. This final version will have two main sections. The first section will provide a definition of the consultation process and platform in a manner that can be reused in any multi-stakeholder consultation process. The second section will report on how this was applied to the NGI domain. This report will act as a public domain document that can act as a best practices definition of a multi-stakeholder consultation process. The consultation process report will be done in conjunction with the other NGI CSAs via the Inter-CSA Working Group (Inter-CSA WG).
